i1.blurb: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} The {{sti|range}} of '''Tristana's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} and {{ai|Buster Shot|Tristana}} is increased by {{pp|0 to 136}} for a total of {{pp|525 to 661}} range.
i1.name: Draw a Bead
notes: * '''Tristana''' can attack {{ui|Baron Nashor}} over the back wall once she hits level 15, a feature shared by {{ci|Caitlyn}}.

q1.blurb: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' gains {{sti|Attack speed|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
q1.name: Rapid Fire
notes: * Ranking up ''Rapid Fire'' while it is active will not increase your [[attack speed]] because it applies a non-refreshing buff.
* ''Rapid Fire'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Tristana's''' previous orders.

w1.blurb: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60%.
On enemy champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} or upon detonating {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} at maximum stacks on an enemy champion, ''Rocket Jump's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.
w1.name: Rocket Jump
notes: * '''Tristana''' can still use basic attacks, abilities, summoner spells and item actives while in the air.
* ''Rocket Jump's'' speed depends on the distance of the jump. {{tip|Melee}} range jumps are much shorter while long range jumps leave '''Tristana''' in the air significantly longer.
* '''Tristana''' is still targetable while jumping and can be hit by [[skillshot]]s such as {{cai|Enchanted Crystal Arrow|Ashe}} and {{cai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}.

** Non-{{tip|airborne}} crowd control effects, such as {{tip|stun|stuns}} and {{tip|root|roots}}, will take effect upon landing and will '''''not''''' cancel the jump, with the exception of {{cai|Event Horizon|Veigar}}.

** All {{tip|airborne}} crowd control effects, such as {{tip|airborne|knockups}}, {{tip|airborne|knockbacks}} and {{tip|airborne|pulls}}, '''''will''''' cancel the jump and then complete their effects as normal.

e1.blurb: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemies explode when slain by '''Tristana's''' basic attacks, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' places an explosive charge on the target enemy or enemy turret. After 4 seconds the charge explodes, dealing {{tip|physical damage}} to nearby enemies. The explosion radius is increased when used on a {{tip|turret}}.

'''Tristana's''' basic attacks and abilities against the target increase ''Explosive Charge's'' damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50 to 130}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Explosive Charge
notes: * ''Explosive Charge's'' active range doesn't benefit from {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' cast time is reduced with {{sti|attack speed}}.
* '''Tristana''' will automatically be ordered to attack the target of ''Explosive Charge''.
* All ''Explosive Charge'' explosions will affect turrets.

r1.blurb: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} the target and all enemies around them.
r1.name: Buster Shot
notes: * '''Tristana''' will automatically be ordered to attack the target of ''Buster Shot''.
* The initial target is affected by {{tip|single target}} spell effects, while subsequent targets take {{tip|area of effect}}.
